item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 4, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

25. US newspapers are deleting old crime stories, offering subjects a 'clean slate' (119 points | 212 comments)
26. Parasitic worms 'manipulate' mantises onto asphalt roads, say researchers (126 points | 91 comments)
27. "AI" on a Calculator: Part 1 (40 points | 11 comments)
28. Yemeni Coffee Shops in Texas (187 points | 144 comments)
